title: English Learning Motivation Enhancement Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English grammar and reading comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessment, with learning materials delivered via smartphones

learning_goals: English learning persistence can be improved by over 20% through the application of diverse motivation strategies

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
